org.zelvator.file

Class FilesInFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zelvator.file.FilesInFolder

  • public class FilesInFolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing files and folders, additionally there are methods for getting numbers and name of test from path.
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilesInFolder(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor takes path, which is path to the selected test.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void delete(java.io.File file)
      This method will try to delete file.
      java.util.List<java.io.File> getFiles() 
      java.io.File getFolder() 
      static java.lang.String getNameOfTest(java.lang.String path)
      From the path it will get last index of \\ and last index of . , this represents in the \tests\test\test.xml String "\test", for only "test" it is required add + 1.
      java.lang.String getPath() 
      void listFilesForFolder(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String suffix)
      Method will fill ArrayList with files in the folder and will search for specified suffix.
      void setFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> files) 
      void setPath(java.lang.String path) 
      static java.lang.String stripNonDigits(java.lang.CharSequence input)
      Method will get numbers from String, used as getting last index from file.

      • listFilesForFolder

        public void listFilesForFolder(java.io.File folder,
                      java.lang.String suffix)
        Method will fill ArrayList with files in the folder and will search for specified suffix. Example: in the tests/test search for all .xml files.
        Parameters:
        folder -
        suffix -

      • delete

        public static void delete(java.io.File file)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method will try to delete file. If the file is directory, it will recursively tries to delete all files in it and then delete directory itself. Sometimes it can not be deleted because java might be using a file, then it will fail and offers to delete it again.
        Parameters:
        file -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • stripNonDigits

        public static java.lang.String stripNonDigits(java.lang.CharSequence input)
        Method will get numbers from String, used as getting last index from file.
        Example: from tests/test/pic10.jpg, only pic10.jpg will be send to this method and here it will get only index (number), that means, it will return "10". Then it can be used in creating new file with index pic11.jpg.
        Parameters:
        input - CharSequence in which will be searched for numbers.
        Returns:
        stripped text with only numbers.

      • getNameOfTest

        public static java.lang.String getNameOfTest(java.lang.String path)
        From the path it will get last index of \\ and last index of . , this represents in the \tests\test\test.xml String "\test", for only "test" it is required add + 1.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        name of the selected test
